context.rdfs:comment: A rating is an evaluation on a numeric scale, such as 1 to 5 stars.
context.rdfs:label: Rating

properties.rdfs:comment: The highest value allowed in this rating system. If bestRating is omitted, 5 is assumed.
properties.rdfs:label: bestRating

properties.rdfs:comment: The lowest value allowed in this rating system. If worstRating is omitted, 1 is assumed.
properties.rdfs:label: worstRating
